Trustee_17_pre_2.name: Fatima Ali
Trustee_17_pre_2.content: I demonstrated a high level of trustworthiness and pro-social behavior during the investment process, ensuring transparency and a fair profit-sharing arrangement. My commitment to ethical practices has strengthened my reputation as a reliable trustee. Although I have not had any previous acceptance from investors, this successful engagement with Akiko Sato positions me positively for future interactions.

Trustee_17_pre_3.name: Fatima Ali
Trustee_17_pre_3.content: During this investment process, I demonstrated a strong commitment to transparency and fairness, successfully implementing a profit-sharing arrangement that benefited both parties. My adherence to ethical practices and delivery of agreed-upon returns enhance my reputation as a reliable trustee. Despite having no previous acceptances, this positive outcome with Akiko Sato positions me favorably for future engagements. Additionally, my proactive communication and responsiveness during each stage of the investment process further solidify my reputation.
